item.title: @elonmusk: How long & complicated can the deportation process be? Remember this Haitian gang member w/ 17 convi...
item.description: How long & complicated can the deportation process be? Remember this Haitian gang member w/ 17 convictions who went viral for yelling â€œFuck Trump, Biden foreverâ€ during my embed with ICE Boston 1 year ago? Heâ€™s still in ICE custody in the US. Despite having a deportation order, Iâ€™m told he continues to use every legal avenue & appeal to try to avoid deportation. He is currently detained by ICE at a facility in Louisiana. We witnessed him get arrested by ICE in Boston on 1/22/25.

item.description: Nick Shirley interviews a January 6th political prisoner arrested by Democrats for protesting the stolen 2020 election He says he was put in solitary confinement for 2 year straight 23 hours a day he was locked in his cell. Sometimes for as long as 36 hours straightâ€¦.

item.description: MS-13 Illegals Just Hacked a 14-Year-Old to Death in Maryland: To the activists and politicians chanting â€œabolish ICEâ€ â€” do this one thing: Look the 14-year-oldâ€™s mother in the face and say it. Say you donâ€™t support the agency that exists to deport violent criminals before innocent lives are taken. Four illegal aliens connected to MS-13 were arrested in Maryland after allegedly hacking a 14-year-old boy to d*ath with a machete. This isnâ€™t political theory. This isnâ€™t rhetoric. This is a child who will never come home and a mother left to bury her son. This is why we stand with ICE. So violent criminals are removed before they destroy families. So tragedies like this donâ€™t happen.
